training.title: The Barcelos Training Academy
training.description: Initial training happens over a 10-day period starting at the Barcelos Training Academy situated in Centurion (Gauteng, South Africa), followed by in-store training of both management and staff prior to your store opening.
training.philosophy: We understand the value of passing down our traditions, values and of course Barcelos customer experience. Beyond food preparation, we provide essential training to everyone that is involved with the day-to-day running of the store.

faqs.question: What is the total investment required?
faqs.answer: Investment varies by format: Standalone stores require ₹1.5-2 Crore, Container stores from ₹1 Crore. This includes franchise fee, fit-out, equipment, and initial working capital. Contact us for a detailed breakdown.

faqs.question: How long does it take to open a store?
faqs.answer: From contract signing to opening: Standalone stores typically take 4-6 months, Container stores 2-3 months depending on site readiness and approvals.

faqs.question: What ongoing fees do I pay?
faqs.answer: 5% royalty fee and 3% advertising fee, both calculated on monthly net turnover. These fees fund your ongoing support, training, marketing, and brand development.

faqs.question: Do I need restaurant experience?
faqs.answer: Restaurant experience is helpful but not required. We provide comprehensive training and ongoing support. What matters most is your passion for the brand, customer service orientation, and willingness to follow proven systems.

faqs.question: Can I own multiple franchises?
faqs.answer: Yes! Multi-unit ownership is encouraged. Many of our most successful partners operate multiple locations. The Container format makes expansion particularly affordable and low-risk.

faqs.question: What territories are available in India?
faqs.answer: We're actively expanding across Tier-1 cities (Mumbai, Delhi NCR, Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad) and select Tier-2 cities. Contact us to discuss territory availability.

faqs.question: How is Barcelos different from other chicken franchises?
faqs.answer: We're the flame-grilled category leader, not fried chicken. Our Portuguese heritage, authentic preparation methods, signature peri-peri marinades, and international brand strength make us uniquely positioned in India's QSR market.

faqs.question: What support do I receive after opening?
faqs.answer: 10 days dedicated on-site support at opening, ongoing field manager visits, marketing campaign support, operational guidance, training updates, and access to our franchise community.
